alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 20 at 11:36AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 50.0 feet, South end of Airport Road closes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 50.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM CDT Friday was 50.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 50.2 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
